languages.text: "Инсценировка. Обман. Двойная и тройная шпионская игра. Она верила, что мои люди затаили зло на Калькасара и рады будут сквитаться с ним, а ей не терпелось нагадить в кашу Лорд-инквизитору после того, как он лишил ее умненького советника, архимагоса Амарната".

"A feint. A deception. A game of double- and triple-crosses. When they told her they intended to take revenge on Calcazar, she believed them — she was just too eager to get back at the Lord Inquisitor for taking her clever Archmagos advisor, Amarnat."
languages.original_text: "Инсценировка. Обман. Двойная и тройная шпионская игра. Она верила, что мои люди затаили зло на Калькасара и рады будут сквитаться с ним, а ей не терпелось нагадить в кашу Лорд-инквизитору после того, как он лишил ее умненького советника, архимагоса Амарната".

traits.locale_text: "A feint. A deception. A double and triple spy game. She had truly believed that I wanted my revenge on Xavier and she was anxious to get back at the Lord Inquisitor for taking her smart archmagos advisor, Amarnat. The rest was easy: voiced a few good ideas here and there, risked my life, did not fall for a provocation — and then I ended up as an inner circle confidant."
traits.speaker: Tanakia

traits.locale_text: "A feint. A deception. A double and triple spy game. She had truly believed that I wanted my revenge on Xavier and she was anxious to get back at the Lord Inquisitor for taking her smart archmagos advisor, Amarnat. The rest was easy: voiced a few good ideas here and there, risked my life, did not fall for a provocation — and then I ended up as an inner circle confidant."
traits.speaker: Tanakia

She truly believed that I wanted my revenge on Xavier and she was anxious to get back at Lord Inquisitor for taking her smart archmagos advisor, Amarnat. The rest was easy: I suggested a couple of good ideas here and there, put my life on the line, eschewed a provocation—and then I ended up as an inner circle confidant."

She truly believed that I wanted my revenge on Xavier and she was anxious to get back at Lord Inquisitor for taking her smart archmagos advisor, Amarnat. The rest was easy: I suggested a couple of good ideas here and there, put my life on the line, eschewed a provocation—and then I ended up as an inner circle confidant."

traits.speaker: Tanakia

traits.locale_text: "A feint. A deception. A game of double- and triple-crosses. When they told her they intended to take revenge on Calcazar, she believed them — she was just too eager to get back at the Lord Inquisitor for taking her clever Archmagos advisor, Amarnat."
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: « Par la ruse, la duperie, un jeu de trahisons. Quand ils lui ont dit qu'ils comptaient se venger de Calcazar, elle les a crus sur parole. Elle n'était que trop impatiente de faire payer le seigneur inquisiteur pour l'avoir privée des précieux conseils de l'archimagos Amarnat. »
languages.original_text: "A feint. A deception. A game of double- and triple-crosses. When they told her they intended to take revenge on Calcazar, she believed them — she was just too eager to get back at the Lord Inquisitor for taking her clever Archmagos advisor, Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: « Par la ruse, la duperie, un jeu de trahisons. Quand ils lui ont dit qu'ils comptaient se venger de Calcazar, elle les a crus sur parole. Elle n'était que trop impatiente de faire payer le seigneur inquisiteur pour l'avoir privée des précieux conseils de l'archimagos Amarnat. »
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: «Un ardid. Un engaño. Un juego a dos... y tres bandas. Cuando se enteró de que querían vengarse de Calcazar, los creyó, cegada por sus deseos de desquitarse con el Lord Inquisidor por haberse llevado a Amarnat, su sabio consejero archimago».
languages.original_text: "A feint. A deception. A game of double- and triple-crosses. When they told her they intended to take revenge on Calcazar, she believed them — she was just too eager to get back at the Lord Inquisitor for taking her clever Archmagos advisor, Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: «Un ardid. Un engaño. Un juego a dos... y tres bandas. Ella se pensaba que yo quería vengarme de Xavier y ardía en deseos de vengarse del Lord Inquisidor por haberse llevado a Amarnat, su sabio consejero archimago. El resto fue sencillo: di un par de buenas ideas, me jugué la vida, evité una provocación... y así acabé siendo su confidente íntimo».
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: “花言巧语、巧言令色，还有双重背叛，或三重背叛之类的。当我手下的那些人说他们打算报复卡尔卡扎的时候，她真的相信了那些人的话。她实在是太急于报复大审判官，因为大审判官带走了她聪明的大贤者阿玛纳特。”
languages.original_text: "A feint. A deception. A game of double- and triple-crosses. When they told her they intended to take revenge on Calcazar, she believed them — she was just too eager to get back at the Lord Inquisitor for taking her clever Archmagos advisor, Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: “花言巧语、巧言令色，还有双重背叛，或三重背叛之类的。那个时候，她急于报复审判长，因为审判长带走了她聪明的大贤者阿玛纳特，而她真的相信我打算报复希维尔。接下来的事情就很简单了，我时不时提几个好主意，偶尔冒一下生命危险，不要惹火她……在那之后，我就变成了她内部圈子里的成员。”
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: 「見せかけ。ごまかし。二重三重の裏切り。彼らがカルカサルに復讐をしたいのだと言ったのを、彼女は本気で信じていた。彼女はただ、自身の賢しい大賢人の助言者、アマルナトを奪ったロード・インクィジターに仕返しがしたくてたまらなかったのさ」
languages.original_text: "A feint. A deception. A game of double- and triple-crosses. When they told her they intended to take revenge on Calcazar, she believed them — she was just too eager to get back at the Lord Inquisitor for taking her clever Archmagos advisor, Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: 「見せかけ。ごまかし。二重三重の裏切り。彼らがカルカサルに復讐をしたいのだと言ったのを、彼女は本気で信じていた。彼女はただ、自身の賢しい大賢人の助言者、アマルナトを奪ったロード・インクィジターに仕返しがしたくてたまらなかったのさ」
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: "Eine Finte. Eine Täuschung. Ein doppeltest Spiel voller Intrigen. Als sie ihr sagten, sie hätten vor, sich an Calcazar zu rächen, glaubte sie ihnen ... sie war einfach zu sehr darauf versessen, dem Großinquisitor die Sache mit ihrem klugen Erzmagos, Amarnat, heimzuzahlen."
languages.original_text: "A feint. A deception. A game of double- and triple-crosses. When they told her they intended to take revenge on Calcazar, she believed them — she was just too eager to get back at the Lord Inquisitor for taking her clever Archmagos advisor, Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: "Eine Harke. Eine Täuschung. Ein doppeltes und dreifaches Spiel. Sie hat wirklich geglaubt, dass ich mich an Xavier rächen wollte, und sie war versessen darauf, sich am Großinquisitor zu rächen, weil er ihr ihren klugen Erzmagos-Berater Amarnat genommen hat. Der Rest war leicht: Ich habe hier und da einige gute Ideen eingebracht, mein Leben riskiert, jede Provokation vermieden — und schon war ich Vertrauter im innersten Kreis."
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: "Bir aldatmaca, bir yalan, ikili ve üçlü oyunlar falan işte. Calcazar'dan intikam almak istediklerini söylediklerinde onlara inanmış. Zeki Başmagos danışmanı Amarnat'ı elinden aldığı için Lord Engizisyoncu'dan intikam almaya can atıyordu."
languages.original_text: "A feint. A deception. A game of double- and triple-crosses. When they told her they intended to take revenge on Calcazar, she believed them — she was just too eager to get back at the Lord Inquisitor for taking her clever Archmagos advisor, Amarnat."
